title: Ep. 74: 'Mr. Robot,' 'Atlanta,' and Netflix's 'Easy' Re-up
description:
The Ringer's Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald discuss how 'Mr. Robot' is playing with reality (8:00), the wonderful third episode of 'Atlanta' (23:00), and Netflix's newest show, 'Easy' (30:00). 
      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
